column1:
The patient is admitted to the behavioural hospital on a voluntary basis for a planned length of stay of eight days (Page 27). Their short-term care plan includes:
- Detoxification and monitoring (Page 17)
- Daily nursing progress assessments (Pages 1,16,17)
- Twice-daily environment patient safety assessments (Pages 1,16)
- Individual therapy, group therapy and expressive therapy (Page 24)
- Administration of medication, including buprenorphine, gabapentin, melatonin, and more (Pages 1,2,3,15,16,25,26)
- Suicidal ideation severity assessment every day at 4:00 pm (Pages 1,16,17,26)
- Other ancillary orders (Pages 16,26)

The patient is expected to return home following this treatment (Page 10).
Page References: Pages 1,2,3,6,10,16,17,22,24,26,27
